actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "city" as it is used in that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act to change the definition of city to include any town or township which contains incorporated places within its boundaries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "city" as it is used in that Act.
